Reference:
Spector P, Stone J, Balco G, Hillebrand T, Thompson M, Black T, 2020. Miocene to Pleistocene glacial history of West Antarctica inferred from nunatak geomorphology and cosmogenic-nuclide measurements on bedrock surfaces. American Journal of Science 320, 637-676.

Data comments:
Sample data compiled and combined from supplementary material and ICE-D database.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology. Several samples grouped with Spector et al. (2019) samples.

expage.github.io - data from expage-202306
